item.title: Refreshed Site
item.description:
Welcome to mackeracher.com! This is my personal website, recently updated.

What’s all this?

I’m hoping to use this space to collect my thoughts on computer programming, entrepreneurship, maths, music, or general life events. I like reading and writing, and it might be nice to publish some of what I write. Maybe some intrepid sailors of the information high seas will find some utility here. Or maybe not.

Themes, ideas, plans

No promises to update this website regularly. When I do publish any posts, they’ll likely be about using Emacs, programming with Clojure, functional programming, entrepreneurship, financial technology, or Canada.
